```{r}
library("ready4") 
```


# R packages that extend ready4

```{r warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
x <- make_pkg_extensions_tb()
```

```{r warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
print_pkg_extensions(x)
```


# Classes that extend ready4

```{r warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
y <- make_modules_tb(x)
```

## Modules (S4 Classes)

```{r }
print_modules(y,
              what_1L_chr = "S4")

```

## Sub-modules (S3 Classes)
```{r }
print_modules(y,
              what_1L_chr = "S3")

```
